pullRequest.title: Simplify gradle test task error reporting
pullRequest.bodyText:
Avoid using extra plugin
Avoid extra task listener (should be avoided related to #57918 )
Keep all logic for reporting failures in the TestListener
Avoids overhead for non decorated tasks and up-to-date test tasks

commit.message:
Simplify test error reporting

- avoid using extra plugin
- avoid extra task listener (should be avoided related to #57918 )
- keep all logic in the listener

Always use test task logger in test listener

- makes linking output to the test task possible in GE console output

nodes.bodyText: Removing the task listener also fixes an incompatibility with upcoming gradle configuration cache. see https://docs.gradle.org/6.6-rc-1/userguide/configuration_cache.html#config_cache:requirements:build_listeners for details
